function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identification of drugs with potential anti-coronavirus effects","Impact":"Uncontrolled use or promotion of drugs without sufficient testing or clinical trials","Mitigation":"Conducting rigorous testing and clinical trials to confirm the safety and efficacy of identified drugs","Technologies":"Clinical trial protocols, laboratory testing and analysis tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, regulatory agencies","Owner":"Healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Use of ontology-based integration and analysis of anti-coronavirus drugs","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to inappropriate drug use or treatment","Mitigation":"Validation of data and results by domain experts and researchers, clear communication of findings","Technologies":"Semantic similarity calculation methods, ontology mapping tools, data validation techniques","People":"Researchers, healthcare providers, policy makers","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare providers, policy makers"},{"Description":"Unregulated promotion of drugs based on information extracted from ontologies","Impact":"Potential risk of adverse effects or drug interactions due to uninformed or inappropriate use","Mitigation":"Education and guidance on proper drug usage, monitoring of adverse effects, regulatory oversight","Technologies":"Drug information databases, adverse event monitoring systems, patient education tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, pharmaceutical companies","Owner":"Healthcare providers, regulatory agencies"}]}
